coref_content: Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution − announce enhancement to Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution's cloud - base FortiCloud management system and a new line of cloud - manage wireless access point ( APs ), continue Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution's strategic investment and momentum in the secure wireless networking market. Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution's FortiAP - S series" wireless lan ( WLAN ) ap be the most secure cloud - manage enterprise Wi - Fi product on the market, feature Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution's cybersecurity technology run directly on Fortinet ’s FortiAP - S series" wireless lan ( WLAN ) ap and the late s ecurity update from Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution's industry - lead FortiGuard Labs Threat Intelligence team. now organization no long need to sacrifice security when opt to manage organization's enterprise wireless lan from the cloud. distribute organization face many challenge as distribute organization deploy and manage a wireless LAN solution for distribute organization's customer and employee. current enterprise WLAN solution often require complex architecture to segment guest and internal network, while demand extra hardware like separate WLAN controller and security appliance. while emerge cloud - manage Wi - Fi vendor have help to reduce the complexity and management issue associate with deploy wireless network, move WLAN control into the cloud have introduce security challenge that have yet to be address until now. Fortinet ’s FortiAP - S series" wireless lan ( WLAN ) ap empower organization to forego separate WLAN controller without expose the network to cyber - threat. every FortiAP - S series access point be centrally manage through its cloud - base FortiCloud management system, enable effortless Wi - Fi network deployment and management, increase security, visibility and control, and reduce overall infrastructure complexity. this make it easy for organization to implement and manage a secure Wi - fi network, while the scalability of cloud management make the solution ideal for distribute enterprise that may have thousand of site. Fortinet ’s FortiAP - S series" wireless lan ( WLAN ) ap be load with advanced security feature like intrusion prevention, web filtering, rouge AP detection, antivirus security protection, granular application control and more, all run directly on Fortinet ’s FortiAP - S series" wireless lan ( WLAN ) ap. advanced security feature like intrusion prevention, web filtering, rouge AP detection, antivirus security protection, granular application control and more be all back by Fortinet ’s industry - lead FortiGuard Labs Threat Intelligence team to ensure each FortiAP - S be protect against the very late advanced threat, in real - time. this sophisticated level of hardware and software integration be only make possible by Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution's expertise and dedication to high - performance security engineering and research. Fortinet ’s FortiAP - S series" wireless lan ( WLAN ) ap combine the flexibility of cloud management, the late generation of wireless access point technology and the prove security of FortiGuard, all form a secure wireless architecture for enterprise access network, " say Rajesh Maurya, Country Manager, India & SAARC at Fortinet − a global leader in high - performance cybersecurity solution ..
